title: Question 16: Why the voice quality is poor or calling with noise while using HSPA data card as uplink ?
answer:
(1) If this problem appears, check the condition of the network is well or not. You could examine the signal of handset that is near to you or plug the HSPA device into PC for checking signal in the background;
(2) Check whether there is EMI source near to the HSPA device or not.
(3) You could augment the distance between HG and the HSPA device by adding the length of USB cable between HG and the HSPA device in order to prevent from co-channel interference.
(4) Adjust the direction of the HSPA device and set the trail part of the HSPA device a higher position.
